job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad (0-1 years of experience)
job.description: You just joined the industry and started exploring how your software skills can accelerate workflows You think  can I do more than this  can I help the transformation of industries at a pace faster than my efforts singularlybrbrAirtables mission is to bring the power of software development to everyone We are developing a toolkit that our customers can leverage to build solutions without writing code It has been extremely rewarding to see what our users are accomplishing with this toolkit From coordinating manufacturing to 3D printing pipelines we see a variety of use cases on Airtable Our goal is to make this toolkit even more powerful while keeping the experience easy to comprehend To achieve this ambitious goal we need growthminded engineers who are passionate about Airtables missionbrbrAt Airtable youll join a highly talented and experienced team with diverse backgrounds ready to move fast and ship highquality features in collaboration with customerfacing teams We practice inclusion foster psychological safety and proactively look to increase diversity on a variety of dimensions You will have the opportunity to learn and grow and your work enables Airtables mission of democratizing software engineeringbrstrongstrongWhat youll dobrstrongstrongul li Spec and build highquality product features that are fast and reliable li li Work at all levels of the stack from AWSNodeJSSQL to ReactHTMLCSS li li Collaborate with other engineers to create reusable and maintainable frontendbackend features systems and abstractions li li Identify opportunities to improve Airtable based on data research and your own intuition li li Work alongside and learn from a talented group of engineers with a diverse range of experiences and backgrounds li ul strongstrongWho you arebrstrongstrongul li Youre a software engineering generalist who values usercentric product development li li You must be enrolled or recently graduated from a degreeseeking program in CS or similar fields li li You have a good understanding of frontendbackend technologies modern frontend JavaScript frameworks and React andor backend systems infrastructure and databases li li You believe the best product is the one that helps users accomplish their goals while growing the business li li You derive joy from refactoring and building clean abstractions in order to make complex systems fun to develop on and easy to understand li li You take a thoughtful approach to decision making knowing when to move fast and when to do things right li ul strongstrongWhat We Offerbrstrongstrongul li We have your medical dental and vision insurance 100 covered and your dependents covered at 65 li li Complimentary One Medical membership for individuals and dependents li li High deductible health plan with health spend account contribution li li 250 monthly wellness stipend for you to invest in your overall wellness li li Mental health support li li Family planning support fertility adoption and surrogacy li li Generous vacation and sick time li li 16 weeks of parental leave li li Learning amp Development we offer a 2000 per year stipend for your personal career development li ul strongstrongAbout Airtable brstrongstrongAirtable is working on the next computer revolution one where anyone  even without technical training  can create customized applications that fit their needs build more interconnected teams and take part in a growing community of people who share what they create Founded in 2012 and headquartered in San Francisco Airtable powers teams at more than 250000 organizations around the world Our most recent funding round valued Airtable at 577 billion and raised 270 million in additional capital and were just getting started
